Error PlatformManager::FileSystem::LoadSystemLibrary ( const char *  pszSysLib,
ISystem **  ppSystem 
)

Loads a system library and returns pointers to the system.

Parameters:
pszSysLib Filename of the system library to load.
ppSystem Returned pointer to the ISystem implementation. Remains untouched on failure.
Returns:
An error code.

Verfies the existence of a file for read access.

Parameters:
pszFileName The file name to look for.
Returns:
True if successful, otherwise false.

Bool PlatformManager::FileSystem::SetCurrentDirToFileLocation ( In pcstr  pszFileName,
In pcstr  apszLocations[],
Out pstr  pszCurrentDir = NULL,
u32  BufferSize = 0 
)

Sets the current directory to the location of a file.

Parameters:
pszFileName The file name to look for.
apszLocations A null terminated array of relative search directories.
pszCurrentDir Location to store the new current directory or NULL.
BufferSize The size of pszCurrentDir.
Returns:
True if successful, otherwise false.
